abstract: Amazon, the world’s largest online retailer, has made a takeover offer for the movie-rental company Lovefilm, The Sunday Times reported.
snippet: Amazon, the world’s largest online retailer, has made a takeover offer for the movie-rental company Lovefilm, The Sunday Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Amazon, the world’s largest online retailer, has made a takeover offer for the movie-rental company Lovefilm, which values it at close to £200 million ($312 million), The Sunday Times reported, without citing sources.

headline.main: Amazon Said to Be in Bid for All of Lovefilm
